about:
I am Adrian Yuki from Japan and living in England now, software architect and open-source enthusiast who have over 12 years of experience in digital products.


 During my career, worked as a full-stack lead and mid engineer in many worldwide IT companies and built lots of successful projects, and developed some innovative technologies.

 Now I am also Co-Founder and CTO of WebVA, a startup agency company, where we develop technologies to build e-commerce businesses and Blockchain industries.
